Class JDBCEndpointConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.jdbc.server.remote.JDBCEndpointConfiguration

  • public class JDBCEndpointConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration of the JDBC endpoint.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBCEndpointConfiguration()
      Ctor - initializes default configuration parameters.
